other_feedback:
I am providing feedback regarding my experience as a customer paying for my phone in installments.
 Firstly, I am consistently inconvenienced by the necessity to visit a MoPhones shop to enable app installations from sources other than the Play Store. This is a time-consuming process and incurs transport costs, despite me making timely payments. I urge you to implement a remote solution for this, as it appears to be a technical restriction on the device that could be managed digitally.
 Secondly, your payment app recently experienced an issue ("something went wrong") for two days, and I was again instructed to visit a shop for resolution. This is unacceptable given the app is crucial for my timely payments. A reliable and remotely supportable app is essential.
 These issues create unnecessary burdens on customers and diminish the positive experience of paying for a phone on flexible terms. I hope you will consider these points and work towards more customer-friendly, remote support solutions.

nps_reason:
The main reason for my score is that the battery performance is quite poor, lasting barely three hours even under normal use. This short battery life makes the device inconvenient for daily activities such as calls, browsing, or streaming. The phone also tends to overheat, several background apps continue running unnecessarily, and the system software appears poorly optimized for power saving. Additionally, the high screen brightness and display settings consume more energy, suggesting that the battery quality or capacity needs improvement.
 
 I also find the interest rates on your payment plans to be quite high. It would be more considerate and customer-friendly if these rates were waived, reduced, or rationed to make your products more affordable. Taking these steps would greatly improve customer satisfaction, strengthen trust, and enhance the overall experience with MoPhones.
improvement_suggestion: MoPhones should focus on improving battery quality and power optimization to ensure the device lasts at least a full day under normal use. Enhancing system software to limit background app activity, improving cooling to prevent overheating, and offering genuine, high-capacity batteries would make a big difference. Additionally, revising the current interest rates to be more affordable or introducing flexible repayment options would show greater consideration for customers and encourage long-term loyalty.

nps_reason:
Main reason for your score
 I chose the Samsung Note 20 specifically for the S-Pen and Air Actions, because my work depends heavily on precision and digital productivity. Unfortunately, the S-Pen does not connect to S-Air at all. This should have been checked before the device was handed over. It shows a lack of attention, a lack of care, and a level of negligence from whoever was responsible.
 On top of that, the device came with Nuovo, which blocks me from installing important apps I use for my online work. So I am left with a phone that cannot perform its core functions for my daily tasks.
 For me, this experience reflects a high level of incompetence and a breakdown in basic quality control. That is why my score is zero.
improvement_suggestion:
Please test every device fully before releasing it especially key features like S-Pen Air Actions. Remove unnecessary restrictions like Nuovo or provide an alternative solution that allows customers to install essential apps for their work.
 A customer should never feel like the phone they received is working against them instead of supporting them.
